name: Eutierria
description:
Join our robot S.A.M as he searches the vast environment of this strange planet in search of his beloved Creator. Collect fuel chunks, investigate the surrounding machinery, and decode satellite transmissions to find clues. Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move around, and keep in mind that this game is a demo!

*This game only runs on Windows systems*

This game is made by Hannah Meyer and Amanda Miller for our Senior Show! Please visit to see the works of our fellow classmates -->here

Hannah Meyer is a multimedia animator and videographer with a passion for storytelling. Born in Johnson City, Tennessee in 1999, and raised in rural Virginia, her love of weaving compelling narratives and characters began at a very young age and continues to this day. Her recent work has been influenced heavily by the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, as well as themes of forgotten history, the environment, and the self. Hannah will be graduating in May 2021 with a BFA in Kinetic Imaging and a minor in Art History.

Amanda Miller is a 3D artist and game developer born in 1999 and raised in Springfield, Virginia. She is set to graduate in May of 2021 with a BFA in Kinetic Imaging from Virginia Commonwealth University’s School of the Arts with a focus in 3D modeling/animation and game design. She uses her skills in worldbuilding to create simulated environments that inspire introspection and appreciation for both virtual and real life. She plans on working as an independent or freelance game developer after graduation.
